Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: Represents a team of agents, Salesforce users, or Slack users in a Slack channel or thread dedicated to solving a problem. This problem can be related to a support case, incident, sales opportunity, or change request.

CollaborationUrl.description: URL of the Slack channel or thread.

EndedDateTime.description: Date and time the swarm ended.

HelpNeeded.description: Short description of the problem that the swarm is trying to solve.

IsDedicatedChannel.description: Indicates if the swarm is happening in a dedicated channel (true) or in an existing channel (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MessageKey.description: ID of the Slack thread or message.

RelatedRecordId.description: ID of the record the swarmâ€™s problem is related to. The record can be of, for example, a case, incident, sales opportunity, or change request.

StartedDateTime.description: Date and time the swarm started.
